title: What is the meaning of the lyrics “I'm a courtside killer queen” in Katy Perry's song “Swish Swish”? - Quora

response.answer_text: Killer Queen is one of Katy’s perfume fragrances, which she first introduced in 2013 and named after the 1974 Queen song. In 2012, she told Billboard the song inspired her to pursue her career in music: And one of my friends… one day pulled out a record, a song in particular called “Killer Queen” by Queen. … And I thought to myself, ‘Oh my gosh, this music is incredible. These lyrics speak to me…’ and that’s what made me want to be what I am today. And courtside seats are the seats on the floor of the basketball arena, not higher up in the stands.

It's a metaphor. 'Cause you're a joker And I'm a courtside killer queen And you will kiss the ring You best believe In medieval times, jokers were people who were hired to entertained the royal. “Killer Queen” is one of Katy Perry’s perfume fragrances that she introduced in 2013 named after the 1974 Queen Song.
